textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   Wonder if Canon picks up on this as its cameras go WiFi, as Canon always had a strong Camera Control software that one installs on their computer or laptop.  Might be called Camera Window? Remember it way back with the S45 camera. "Actually, also remote viewfinder could be much more useful than now, if it could work in any modes allowing to change any settings."
